|brand = Gemtek |model = WPEA-113N |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 2, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Gemtek_WPEA-113N |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002a |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 1000 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = MXF-P970813N |icid = 3069B-WPEA113N |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:21:00,00:26:82
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA, U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/30/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00HHF5K4M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B001GV2320 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WPEA-113N_V01A" and "ENG-X10-3101R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The device is depicted in FCC photos as having RP-SMA connectors or (not and) U.FL connectors.
This device is HP P/N: 502299-001. :This particular device used by HP has two RP-SMA connectors.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
